112.content:
With a soft sigh Sakura lifted her chunkier self off the bench she had been sitting upon and decided to go pay Naruto a surprise morning visit.

Sasuke had fled from the village a good long while ago and in that time Sakura had come to second guess her supposed "love" for the Uchiha avenger and instead learn to appreciate the company of her one constant teammate, Naruto, even if he did annoy her from time to time but it was better then not having a shoulder to lean on at all.

So all that aside Sakura soon found herself right outside Naruto's apartment door.

Fumbling with her fingers through one of her pockets she eventually pulled out a spare key the blonde ninja had given to her just in case she ever wanted to have a chat, hang out, or whatever (Naruto secretly hoped he could perhaps get a date out of her one of this days though).

A moment later, after picking away at the lock with the key in her hand, she entered the small-sized apartment. Looking around she had it on good authority that the blonde ninja was still asleep. While a few things were tossed around here and there they also appeared to be untouched since the moment they were scattered about.

Sakura's hearing then picked up on the slight sound of Naruto snoring away, obviously the source of the sound came from the door leading to his room.

With a bit of a chuckle Sakura sat herself down on the nearby couch, amusingly she thought about knocking at his door to awake her friend and see his no doubt priceless reaction but before she could do that a slight rumble came from her belly.

She had forgotten to get a bite to eat this morning and apparently her belly was taking a moment to remind her of said mistake.

Sakura sighed once more, a habit she seem to be doing a lot lately, as she got up and headed toward Naruto's kitchen. Surely he wouldn't mind if she got herself a snack, even if all he seem to ever have was different kinds of ramen.

1122.content:
Disclaimer:I don't own Naruto


Hearing noise coming from his kitchen, Naruto awakes with a start. Grabbing a kunai off of his nightstand and holding it in a reverse grip, Naruto quietly heads to investigate. Once he was in the hallway, Naruto took a peek out toward the kitchen and was shocked at what he saw...

Sakura was at Naruto's kitchen table with her back turned to him, eating his ramen.

A lot of his ramen.

He didn't know how long she had been at it, but it must have been a while.

There were five empty ramen cups stacked beside her and she was working on the sixth. Sakura had even eaten the plate of sweet buns(5) that Ayame had given him last night!

........"Whoa...." was all the demon container could think as he watched Sakura finish her 6th cup of ramen a start of the 7th.

After his moment of shock wore of, Naruto pulled his head back and rational thought returned to the whiskered blond..

"Whe...How did Sakura get so big!?" was the first thing he thought to him self.

Peeking his head back out to look again, Naruto was shocked to see that she was done with the 7th cup and on her 8th.

"....Pork, chicken, beef, shrimp, miso..."

"Buuuurp." Naruto' musings were cut off by a belch from Sakura.

Shocked once again, Naruto pulls his head back.

"This has got be a genjutsu!!" he thought. Sure that this was an illusion, Naruto cuts himself with the kunai, peeks his head out and finds that.....

Sakura is on her 9th cup.

"......................"

Pulling his head back again, Naruto took a moment to assess the situation.

"Okay.., Sakura is in my apartment, sitting at my table, eating my ramen and she's....fat."

Looking out again, Naruto see's that Sakura is about to move to another cup.

"Damn she can eat" Naruto thought.

Looking at Sakura eat, Naruto already knew how she got fat. He also knew that since she could eat so much, her stomach had to have expanded over time, meaning that she had been eating like this for a while. He knew that this had to have started when Sausuke left the village, so that settled the question of when. But that still left....

"How the hell didn't I notice this before!?" He thought to himself, watching as Sakura started on her 11th cup. "I mean, she's my teammate!" "Kakashi may or may not have noticed anything, you can never tell with him"

But as Naruto continued to watch Sakura, he couldn't help but be slightly turned on as she finished her 11th cup, leaned back in the chair and sighed, rubbing her belly, seemingly satisfied.

"Well.. she does have breasts now" he thought(he could see them while she leaned back).

Naruto watched Sakura for a few moments longer until she suddenly regained her self and looked in shock at the amount of food she had just eaten. Sakura immediately got up and started to clean up. Once she gathered her trash, Sakura went to throw it away. After she took two steps she dropped one of the empty cups. Sakura bent over to pick it up, unknowingly giving Naruto a look at her ass crammed into the bike shorts she wore under her skirt.

"Nice" Naruto thought to him self, as he pulled his head back and headed back into his room. He didn't want to get caught looking.

Naruto was pretty sure that Sakura would leave after she cleaned up, more than likely ashamed of her self.

Naruto was a simple person. He knew what he liked and what he didn't. What he wanted and what he didn't. And while he was shocked at first, he knew he liked what he just saw out of Sakura. He knew wanted her more than ever before.

Naruto heard his door closing and knew that Sakura had left. He decided to wait a couple of hours before he asked her out to eat....
